Class ICalPropertyScribe.DateWriter

  • java.lang.Object

  • Enclosing class:
    ICalPropertyScribe<T extends ICalProperty>

    protected static class ICalPropertyScribe.DateWriter
extends Object
    Factory class for writing dates.
